text: "1, 2, 3" () is a song by Mexican singer Sofía Reyes featuring American singers Jason Derulo and De La Ghetto. It was released as a single on February 16, 2018. The song was written by Reyes, Derulo, Ghetto, Nicole Zignago, Ricardo Montaner, Jon Leone and Charlie Guerrero. ==Background== While talking about the song, Sofía Reyes said; ==Music video== The music video for the song, directed by Mike Ho, was shot in Los Angeles. It premiered via Reyes' YouTube channel on February 16, 2018 and received a nomination for a Lo Nuestro Award for Video of the Year. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- !
